verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted me up אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Moreover the spirit וַתָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹ֠תִי <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִי֙ <S%H6931><s%> me unto the east הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> which looketh קָדִ֔ימָה <S%H6921><s%> eastward וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold בְּפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> and behold at the door הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> five אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וָאֶרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> whom I saw בְתוֹכָ֜ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַאֲזַנְיָ֧ה <S%H2970><s%> Jaazaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזֻּ֛ר <S%H5809><s%> of Azur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלַטְיָ֥הוּ <S%H6410><s%> and Pelatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <S%H1141><s%> of Benaiah שָׂרֵ֖י <S%H8269><s%> princes הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <S%H376><s%> are the men הַחֹשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H2803><s%> that devise אָ֛וֶן <S%H205><s%> mischief וְהַיֹּעֲצִ֥ים <S%H3289><s%> and give עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> counsel רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> wicked בָּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> who

הָאֹ֣מְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> Which say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not בְקָר֖וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [It is] not near בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> let us build בָּתִּ֑ים <S%H1004><s%> houses הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he הַסִּ֔יר <S%H5518><s%> this [city is] the caldron וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> and we [be] the flesh

לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> Therefore prophesy עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> against הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> against them prophesy בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> O son אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of man

וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> fell עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> Then ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> upon me and said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto me Speak כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> Thus have ye said בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> the things that come רֽוּחֲכֶ֖ם <S%H7307><s%> into your mind אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְדַעְתִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H3045><s%> for I know

הִרְבֵּיתֶ֥ם <S%H7235><s%> Ye have multiplied חַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2491><s%> your slain בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וּמִלֵּאתֶ֥ם <S%H4390><s%> and ye have filled חוּצֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H2351><s%> the streets חָלָֽל׃ <S%H2491><s%> thereof with the slain פ

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD חַלְלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H2491><s%> Your slain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom שַׂמְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> whom ye have laid בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> of the city הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> of it they [are] the flesh וְהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> and this הַסִּ֑יר <S%H5518><s%> and this [city is] the caldron וְאֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> but I will bring you forth מִתּוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst

חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword יְרֵאתֶ֑ם <S%H3372><s%> Ye have feared וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> a sword אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> and I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> upon you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> And I will bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> of the midst וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> thereof and deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> you into the hands זָרִ֑ים <S%H2114><s%> of strangers וְעָשִׂ֛יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and will execute בָכֶ֖ם שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <S%H8201><s%> judgments

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword תִּפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> Ye shall fall עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶשְׁפּ֣וֹט <S%H8199><s%> I will judge אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> This לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶם֙ לְסִ֔יר <S%H5518><s%> This [city] shall not be your caldron וְאַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְתוֹכָ֖הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst לְבָשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> neither shall ye be the flesh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> thereof [but] I will judge אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> my בְּחֻקַּי֙ <S%H2706><s%> in my statutes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> for ye have not walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> neither executed וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <S%H4941><s%> after the manners הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> but have done

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came כְּהִנָּ֣בְאִ֔י <S%H5012><s%> And it came to pass when I prophesied וּפְלַטְיָ֥הוּ <S%H6410><s%> that Pelatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּנָיָ֖ה <S%H1141><s%> of Benaiah מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> died וָאֶפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> Then fell I down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <S%H2199><s%> and cried קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud וָאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כָּלָה֙ <S%H3617><s%> a full end אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> will You עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> wilt thou make אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> of the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man אַחֶ֤יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brethren אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> [even] thy brethren אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> the men גְאֻלָּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1353><s%> of thy kindred וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom אָמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> have said לָהֶ֜ם יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> wholly [are] they unto whom the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem רַֽחֲקוּ֙ <S%H7368><s%> Get you far מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לָ֥נוּ הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> this נִתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> given הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto us is this land לְמוֹרָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H4181><s%> in possession ס

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Though הִרְחַקְתִּים֙ <S%H7368><s%> Although I have cast them far off בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and though הֲפִֽיצוֹתִ֖ים <S%H6327><s%> and although I have scattered בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> them among the countries וָאֱהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶם֙ לְמִקְדָּ֣שׁ <S%H4720><s%> sanctuary מְעַ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> yet will I be to them as a little בָּאֲרָצ֖וֹת <S%H776><s%> in the countries אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> where they shall come שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it ס

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> GOD וְקִבַּצְתִּ֤י <S%H6908><s%> I will even gather אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> you from the people וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <S%H622><s%> and assemble אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נְפֹצוֹתֶ֖ם <S%H6327><s%> where ye have been scattered בָּהֶ֑ם וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> you the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וּבָ֖אוּ־ <S%H935><s%> And they shall come שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וְהֵסִ֜ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> thither and they shall take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁקּוּצֶ֛יהָ <S%H8251><s%> all the detestable things וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H8441><s%> thereof and all the abominations מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> and I

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give לָהֶם֙ לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> them one וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <S%H2319><s%> a new אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and I will put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <S%H7130><s%> within וַהֲסִ֨רֹתִ֜י <S%H5493><s%> you and I will take לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> heart הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> the stony מִבְּשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> out of their flesh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and will give לָהֶ֖ם לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> them an heart בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> of flesh

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> because of בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> may walk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <S%H4941><s%> mine ordinances יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and keep וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְהָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֣י לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> them and they shall be my people וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and I will be their God

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about לֵ֧ב <S%H3820><s%> But [as for them] whose heart שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H8251><s%> of their detestable things וְתוֹעֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> and their abominations לִבָּ֣ם <S%H3820><s%> after the heart הֹלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walketh דַּרְכָּם֙ <S%H1870><s%> their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֣ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their own heads נָתַ֔תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I will recompense נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> lift up הַכְּרוּבִים֙ <S%H3742><s%> Then did the cherubims אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3671><s%> their wings וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> and the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <S%H5980><s%> beside וּכְב֧וֹד <S%H3519><s%> them and the glory אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> [was] over them above

וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> went up כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> And the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from the midst הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which מִקֶּ֥דֶם <S%H6924><s%> which [is] on the east side לָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Afterwards the spirit נְשָׂאַ֗תְנִי <S%H5375><s%> took me up וַתְּבִיאֵ֤נִי <S%H935><s%> and brought כַשְׂדִּ֙ימָה֙ <S%H3778><s%> into Chaldea אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> to them of the captivity בַּמַּרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> me in a vision בְּר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> by the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> went up מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> So הַמַּרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> So the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i רָאִֽיתִי׃ <S%H7200><s%> that I had seen

וָאֲדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> Then I spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַגּוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1473><s%> unto them of the captivity אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> all the things יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הֶרְאָֽנִי׃ <S%H7200><s%> had shewed פ
